modules.description: Provides pattern matching with binding capabilities, enabling extraction and binding of values from complex data structures. Works with OCaml's variant types, records, and tuples to destructure and bind variables inline. Used to simplify nested pattern matching in code that processes abstract syntax trees or parsed input.

Replaces or renames variables in patterns based on a provided function, extracts variables from value bindings with module and location context, and constructs match expressions with custom handling of destructured patterns. Operates on OCaml AST elements like patterns, value bindings, and expressions, incorporating location and module information. Used to transform pattern matching logic during code generation or rewriting processes.
